name: Humans Vs Ghouls
description: Humans Vs Ghouls is an online top-down shooter following survivors of a ghoul apocalypse that blast foes to live another day. Create your hero to earn blasters and equipment along the way to kill ghouls and survive the night. Based on the college game Humans vs Zombies, players will be put on either the human or ghoul team. Humans have ranged blasters to keep ghouls at a distance while ghouls will need to get in close range to tag humans and swap their team.
